document.full_text: two denver police officers captured on videotape knocking women to the ground with nightsticks and spraying them with mace have been fired for lying to investigators about the arrests.
document.title: denver policemen fired over manhandling of women
lines_and_colors: two denver police officers captured on videotape knocking women to the ground with nightsticks and spraying them with mace have been fired for lying to investigators about the arrests.
